sent.orig: What is pretty?The star says twinkle spark is pretty.
sent.trans: 什么是美丽的？星星说闪烁的星光是美丽的。

sent.orig: Loveliness not because of being pretty, while being pretty is because of loveliness!
sent.trans: 不是因为美丽而可爱，而是因为可爱而美丽！

sent.orig: I'm sitting pretty in a pretty city.
sent.trans: 我在一个漂亮的城市过的很好！

sent.orig: We do also have some pretty extreme missions, where the carnage meter is pretty high.
sent.trans: 我们确实也有一些非常极端的任务，那里的屠杀米则相当高。

sent.orig: What makes him a tough player? He's pretty serious, pretty calm on the court?
sent.trans: 问：什么使得柳成为一个难对付的球员？是他在场上的严肃和镇静吗？
